title: Line String
description: Represents one or more line strings to be drawn as edges of a triangle mesh

indices.description: The index of the accessor that contains the vertex indices for the line strings
indices.gltf_detailedDescription: The index of the accessor that contains the vertex indices. The accessor **MUST** have `SCALAR` type and an unsigned integer component type. The indices are permitted to include the maximal index value for the component type, indicating the start of a new line string.

material.description: The index of a glTF material with which the edges are to be drawn.
material.gltf_detailedDescription: The index of a glTF material with which the edges are to be drawn. If omitted, the edges are drawn using the same material as the edges encoded by the extension's `visibility` field, or else that of the triangle mesh primitive.
